title: v-if and v-for on same element
explanation: Never use `v-if` on the same element as `v-for`. `v-if` has higher priority in Vue 3 (lower in Vue 2), leading to errors where `item` is undefined. Use a computed property or wrapper `<template>`.

title: Computed Caching
codeSnippet: Computed properties are cached based on their reactive dependencies.
explanation: They only re-evaluate when a dependency changes.

title: Mutating props directly
explanation: Props are one-way data flow. Mutating them directly in the child warning in console and will be overwritten by parent updates. Emit an event instead.

title: v-show vs v-if DOM
codeSnippet: v-show removes the element from the DOM.
explanation: `v-show` toggles CSS `display: none`. `v-if` adds/removes the element.

title: Data property not a function
explanation: In components, `data` must be a function returning an object (`data() { return { ... } }`) to maintain independent state copies per instance.

title: Vue 3 Composition API
codeSnippet: setup() method is the entry point for Composition API.
explanation: It runs before the component is created.

title: v-model argument syntax
explanation: In Vue 2, `v-model` doesn't take argument (except via model option). In Vue 3, `v-model:modelValue` is default or `v-model:title`. Syntax is valid in Vue 3 ONLY if prop is named 'value'. Standard input uses `v-model="text"`. `v-model:value` implies a prop named value, which might conflict with native value attribute if not careful.

title: Scoped Styles
explanation: Applies styles only to the current component's elements.

title: Multiple root nodes Vue 2
explanation: Vue 2 allows only one root element. Vue 3 supports Fragments (multiple roots).

title: Event Modifiers
explanation: `stop` calls `event.stopPropagation()`.

title: Prop type check failure
explanation: Passing `count="10"` passes a **string** "10". To pass a number, use static binding with `v-bind` (shorthand `:`): `<comp :count="10" />`.

title: Vuex State Mutation
codeSnippet: Mutations are the only way to actually change state in Vuex store.
explanation: Actions commit mutations, mutations change state synchronously.

title: Accessing DOM in created hook
explanation: DOM is not available in `created`. Use `mounted` hook.

title: Watch Immediate
explanation: Triggers the callback immediately with current value.

title: Arrow function in methods
explanation: Arrow functions bind `this` to parent scope (window/undefined), not the Vue instance. Use standard function syntax `inc() { ... }`.

title: Key in v-for
codeSnippet: :key is recommended whenever possible with v-for.
explanation: Helps Vue's diff algorithm identify nodes. Mandatory with `<transition-group>`.

title: Duplicate keys
explanation: Duplicate keys (`0` for all items) cause render errors and state bugs. Key must be unique per item.

title: ref usage
explanation: Access direct child component or DOM element.

title: Async Computed
codeSnippet: computed: { async data() { return await fetch(...) } }
explanation: Computed properties must return a value synchronously. Creating a promise doesn't update view with resolved value. Use `vue-async-computed` plugin or `watch`/`methods`.

title: Slot fallback content
explanation: Renders 'Default Text' if parent provides no content.

title: Interpolation inside attributes
explanation: Mustacles `{{ }}` don't work in attributes. Use `v-bind:href="url"` or `:href="url"`.

title: Dynamic Component
explanation: Switches component based on `currentComponent` value.

title: Key modifier invalid
explanation: `phone` is not a valid key alias/modifier. Use standard keys (.enter, .esc) or key codes/names.

title: Deep Watch
codeSnippet: watch: { obj: { handler: fn, deep: true } }
explanation: Detects nested changes in objects/arrays.

title: Array index assignment Vue 2
explanation: In Vue 2, setting array item by index is NOT reactive. Use `Vue.set(this.items, 0, val)` or `this.items.splice(0, 1, val)`. (Fixed in Vue 3 Proxies).

title: KeepAlive
explanation: Caches inactive component instances.

title: Template root text only
explanation: Valid in Vue 3? Ideally should wrap in element, but text root is allowed in V3 fragments. In Vue 2: Error. Assuming Vue context generally prefers elements. Warning: 'Component template should contain exactly one root element' (Vue 2).

title: Emit Event
explanation: Sends event to parent.

title: Reserved prop name
explanation: `key` and `ref` are reserved attributes in Vue. Cannot use as prop names.

title: NextTick
explanation: Executes after DOM update cycle.

title: Style binding syntax
explanation: `:style` expects an Object or Array, not a string (unless it's a variable containing a string, but literal needs quotes and object format usually preferred). String is actually valid `:style="'color: red'"`. The error here is unquoted `color: red` inside binding expression -> syntax error.

title: Mixin merging
codeSnippet: Lifecycle hooks from mixins are called before component's own hooks.
explanation: They are merged into an array.

title: v-model on div
explanation: `v-model` only works on inputs, selects, textareas, and components. Not on plain divs (unless `contenteditable` with custom handling).

title: Filter syntax deprecation
explanation: Filters (`|`) are removed in Vue 3. Use method calls or computed properties.

title: Method side effect in computed
explanation: Computed properties should be side-effect free. Mutating state causes infinite loops or unpredictable behavior.

title: v-once
codeSnippet: Renders element and children once, skips future updates.
explanation: Optimization for static content.

title: Inject missing provided key
explanation: If key isn't provided by ancestor, accessing it results in warning/error unless `from` or default value is specified.

title: Teleport
explanation: Moves content to another part of DOM (e.g. modals).

title: Reacting to private property
explanation: Properties starting with `_` or `$` are not proxied/exposed on the Vue instance directly to avoid conflicts with internal API. Accessing `this._private` might fail or stay raw.

title: v-html XSS
codeSnippet: v-html can lead to XSS attacks if data is untrusted.
explanation: Matches innerHTML behavior.

title: Child changing prop reference
explanation: Reassigning prop reference is forbidden/warned. Mutating properties of object prop is allowed (but bad practice for data flow).

title: Custom Directive hook
explanation: Vue 2 directive hooks. (Vue 3 renamed to mounted/updated etc).

title: Global mixin usage
explanation: Not Syntax error, but affects ALL components including third-party ones. Extremely dangerous/polluting. Avoid.

title: VeeValidate
codeSnippet: Popular form validation library for Vue.
explanation: Like Formik/React Hook Form but for Vue.

title: Missing return in setup
explanation: If `setup` doesn't return the variables, they are not available in the template.

title: Router View
explanation: Component that renders matched route component.

title: Direct ref access created
explanation: $refs are populated after render. In `created`, DOM doesn't exist yet. Refs are undefined.

title: Pinia
explanation: Simpler API, better TS support.

title: Double mustache in attribute
explanation: Incorrect syntax. Use `:id="id"`.

title: Async setup without Suspense
explanation: If `setup` is async, the component must be used inside a `<Suspense>` boundary (experimental in some versions, standard in others). Otherwise it won't render or errors.

title: Shallow Ref
explanation: Creates a ref that tracks its own .value mutation but doesn't make the value deeply reactive.

title: Provide Inject mismatch
explanation: Injection keys are case-sensitive. `key` vs `Key`. Injection will be undefined.

title: Dynamic Arguments
explanation: Allows binding to an attribute name determined at runtime.

title: Missing emits declaration Vue 3
explanation: In Vue 3, it is highly recommended (and required for some linting/types) to declare emitted events in `emits: ['submit']` option. If not declared, listeners might fall through to root element as native attributes.

title: v-memo
explanation: Memoize a sub-tree of the template. Updates only if dependencies change.

title: Style deep selector deprecated
explanation: `/deep/` and `>>>` are deprecated in Vue 3 (and newer node-sass/css libs). Use `::v-deep(.child)` or `:deep(.child)`.

title: Global Properties
explanation: Replacement for `Vue.prototype` in Vue 3.

title: Watch source invalid
explanation: In Composition API `watch`, first argument must be a ref, reactive object, or a getter function `() => this.count`. Passing a raw primitive value (value of count) breaks reactivity connection.

title: v-slot shorthand
explanation: Standard syntax.

title: Computed setter missing
codeSnippet:
computed: { fullName() { return this.f + this.l } }
// this.fullName = 'New Name'
explanation: Default computed is getter-only. Assigning to it throws error in strict mode or does nothing. Must define `get` and `set`.

title: Effect Scope
explanation: Advanced API to collect side effects and dispose them together.

title: Template access private
codeSnippet: const count = ref(0); // in setup, not returned
explanation: Variables defined in setup must be returned to be used in template (unless using `<script setup>`).

title: Custom Form Input
codeSnippet: Must prop 'modelValue' and emit 'update:modelValue' in Vue 3.
explanation: This replaces `value` / `input` from Vue 2.

title: Watch arrow function this
explanation: Arrow function in options API watch property binds `this` to wrong context. Use standard function.

title: Define Component
explanation: Helper for type inference in TypeScript.

title: Mixin data collision
codeSnippet:
// Mixin: data() { return { x: 1 } }
// Comp: data() { return { x: 2 } }
explanation: Component data takes precedence, but collision can lead to confusion. It merges, and component wins.

title: Suspense
explanation: Renders fallback content while async setup resolves.

title: Reactive destructuring
codeSnippet:
const state = reactive({ count: 0 });
let { count } = state;
explanation: Destructuring a reactive object results in a primitive value `count` that loses reactivity connection. Use `toRefs(state)`.

title: Readonly
explanation: Creates a read-only proxy of the original object.

title: Duplicate slot name
explanation: Duplicate slot names without v-if/v-else logic is invalid or results in only one being rendered/filled.

title: Transition Classes
explanation: Standard classes applied during transition lifecycle (Vue 3 renamed v-enter to v-enter-from).

title: v-for object iteration order
explanation: Iteration order of object keys relies on JS engine implementation (usually insertion order for string keys, sorted for indices), but historically not guaranteed consistent across browsers. Use array for strict order.

title: Event Bus Vue 3
explanation: `$on`, `$off`, `$once` are removed from Vue 3 instances. Use libraries like `mitt` for event bus pattern.

title: Functional Component template
explanation: In Vue 3, `functional` attribute on template is removed. Functional components are created as plain functions.

title: Fragments
codeSnippet: Components can have multiple root nodes.
explanation: No wrapper needed.

title: Root emit validation
explanation:
Valid syntax (no validation). 
Real error: `emits: { submit: (payload) => { return false } }` -> Validation failed warning in console if payload is invalid.

title: Script Setup
explanation: Syntactic sugar for Composition API. Variables are auto-returned.

title: Computed side effect
explanation: Async calls in computed usually don't block return, but side effects (starting request) should be in watchers/methods.

title: Ref vs Reactive
codeSnippet: Reactive works only with objects/collection types.
explanation: Cannot hold primitives (string, number, boolean). Use `ref` for those.

title: V-model modifier typo
explanation: Typo `trm`. Should be `trim`.

title: InheritAttrs
explanation: Prevents automatic fallthrough of attributes to root element.

title: Router Push path vs params
explanation: If `path` is provided, `params` are ignored. Use `name` with `params` or combine params into path string.

title: BeforeRouteEnter
explanation: Called before component is created, so `this` is undefined. Access via `next(vm => ...)` callback.

title: Missing key in transition-group
explanation: Children of `<transition-group>` MUST be keyed uniquely for animations to work.

title: v-pre
codeSnippet: Skips compilation for this element and children.
explanation: Displays raw mustache tags: `{{ val }}`.

title: Slot props scope
explanation: Valid. Slot content is compiled in parent scope. It can access parentData AND slotProps.

title: Accessing slotProps outside template
explanation:
Valid syntax for default slot. 
Real Error: `<child>{{ slotProps.x }}</child>`. `slotProps` is not defined unless declared in `v-slot`.

title: isRef
codeSnippet: Checks if value is a ref object.
explanation: Utility function.

title: Watch deep default
explanation: When watching a reactive object directly, it implicitly watches deeply. Mutation of nested property triggers it. (Not error but nuance to know).

title: Server Side Rendering
explanation: createSSRApp vs createApp.

title: Style module access
explanation:
Valid. 
Error: `<div :class="style.red">`. Default injection name is `$style`.

title: defineProps options
explanation: Macro for declaring props.

title: Router resolve undefined
explanation: If route not found, does it throw or return root? Resolve usually returns a route object even if not found (matched empty or 404 handler). But dereferencing `href` might fail if resolve returns null? No, returns value.

title: Setup props destructuring
explanation: Destructuring props loses reactivity. `title` becomes a static string/value. Use `props.title` or `toRefs(props)`.

title: UseAttrs
explanation: Returns reactive attributes object.

title: v-on object syntax
explanation:
Valid syntax. Binds multiple events. 
Error: `v-on="{ 'click': doThis, 'hover': undefined }"`. Undefined listener might remove it.

title: KeepAlive max
explanation: Limits number of cached instances.

title: Transition mode
explanation:
Valid. 
Error: `mode="simultaneous"`. Only `in-out` and `out-in` supported.

title: v-cloak
codeSnippet: Hides uncompiled mustache bindings until Vue is ready.
explanation: Use with CSS rule `[v-cloak] { display: none }`.

title: Dynamic slot name syntax
explanation:
Valid. 
Error: `v-slot:['name']` quotes inside brackets depending on context.

title: Setup context attrs non-reactive
explanation: `attrs` in setup context is NOT reactive in the sense of being a Ref/Reactive object you can watch directly? Actually documents say "attrs are reactive". But watching the whole object might require deep/function. Wait, documentation says `attrs` is a Proxy but *not* reactive in Vue 3 (updated on re-render, but not a reactive object itself to watch property changes?). Safer to use `onUpdated` or `useAttrs()`.

title: v-for on template key
explanation: In Vue 2, `<template>` cannot be keyed. Key must be on the children. In Vue 3, keys should be placed on the `<template>` tag itself. Code is correct for Vue 3, error for Vue 2.

title: Reactive vs Ref unwrapping
codeSnippet: Refs inside reactive objects are automatically unwrapped.
explanation: `state.count` returns value, not ref.

title: Multiple root nodes transitions
explanation: `<transition>` can only have one root element or component active at a time (unless using list transition group).

title: Prop mutation warning
codeSnippet: Vue warns if child mutates a prop.
explanation: Respects one-way data flow.

title: Computed async return
codeSnippet: computed: { async user() { return await api.get(); } }
explanation: Computed properties cannot be async. They must return value synchronously. Use `vue-async-computed` or just `watch` + `data`.

title: $atts
explanation: In Vue 3, yes. In Vue 2, no.

title: Watch multiple sources syntax
explanation:
Correct syntax for Composition API. 
Error: `watch(a, b, (newA, newB) => ...)`.

title: Setup context exposure
explanation: Limits what is accessible via template refs.

title: v-bind kebab-case camelCase
explanation:
This works. Vue automatically converts kebab-case in templates to camelCase in props. 
Error: `props: ['user-name']` is invalid JS identifier usually (needs quotes), but Vue normalizes to camelCase.

title: v-once vs static
codeSnippet: v-once makes element static after first render.
explanation: Ignores future updates.

title: Filters in Vue 3
explanation: Filters are removed in Vue 3. Use method/computed `formatDate(date)`.

title: Provide/Inject Reactivity
codeSnippet: Injected properties are NOT reactive by default.
explanation: Unless you pass a Ref or Reactive object.

title: Computed setter only
explanation: Computed property must have a getter.

title: Router link active class
explanation: Default class for active link.

title: Reactive array push
explanation: Cannot reassign a `const` variable. Even if `let`, reassigning replaces the proxy with plain array, losing reactivity connection. Use `list.push(...)` or `list.splice(...)`.

title: Slots scope
codeSnippet: Parent template accesses child data directly.
explanation: No, parent accesses parent scope. Needs scoped slots to access child data.

title: v-model file input
explanation: File inputs are read-only. `v-model` doesn't work. Use `@change` listener.

title: Vue.set Vue 3
explanation: Proxies make it unnecessary.

title: Template ref outside mounted
codeSnippet: setup() { const el = ref(null); onCreated(() => el.value.focus()); }
explanation: Element refs are null until mounted. `onCreated` (if it existed, effectively setup body) runs before DOM logic. Use `onMounted`.

title: Dynamic Components KeepAlive
codeSnippet: KeepAlive works with component is attribute.
explanation: Caches the dynamic component instance.

title: Watch deep optional
explanation:
Correct. 
Error: `watch(reactiveObj, fn, { deep: false })`. Reactive objects are implicitly deep watched in Vue 3 watching source, hard to opt-out unless using getter.

title: Ref unwrap in template
explanation: Refs are automatically unwrapped in top-level template properties. Use `{{ count }}`.

title: Router guards next usage
explanation:
Correct in Vue Router 4 (return bool/route). 
Error: `beforeEach((to, from, next) => { return true; })` mixing return value with `next` argument presence can be ambiguous or strict. Ideally if `next` is present, you MUST call it.

title: Scoped CSS deep
explanation: Standard way to affect child components from scoped styles.

title: Multiple V-models argument conflict
explanation: Duplicate attribute/prop `title`. Can't bind same model arg twice.

title: Suspensible
explanation: Will trigger Suspense fallback.

title: Setup return render function collision
explanation: Unreachable code. If setup returns a function, that IS the render function. You cannot return variables for the template AND a render function simultaneously (choose one approach).

title: Teleport disabled
explanation: Content stays in place if disabled.

title: Props default reference
explanation: Object/Array defaults must be a factory function `default: () => []` to avoid sharing reference across instances.

title: v-is deprecated
explanation: Deprecated in favor of `is="vue:component-name"`.

title: Directives hook arguments
explanation: `binding` object is read-only. Modifying it doesn't affect anything/throws error. Use `el` to manipulate DOM.

title: TransitionGroup Tag
explanation: In Vue 3 it renders no wrapper (fragment) by default unless `tag` prop is specified. (Vue 2 was span).

title: V-if with V-for precedence Vue 2 vs 3
explanation: Ambiguous. In Vue 2 `v-for` has higher priority. In Vue 3 `v-if` has higher priority. Avoid mixing them. Use template wrapper or computed.

title: Custom Event Case
codeSnippet: Events emitted are case-insensitive in DOM templates.
explanation: camelCase emit 'myEvent' becomes 'myevent' listener in DOM. Use kebab-case 'my-event'.

title: Reactive Map Set
codeSnippet: const map = reactive(new Map()); map.set(key, val);
explanation:
Correct. Vue 3 Reactive supports Map and Set. 
Error: expecting it NOT to work?

title: readonly reactivity
explanation: Nested properties are also readonly.

title: DefineEmits return
explanation:
Correct. 
Error: `defineEmits` outside of `<script setup>` top level? (It's a macro).

title: Keyup modifier chaining
explanation: Trigger only if Alt + Enter is pressed.

title: Setup duplicate declaration
codeSnippet:
setup() { const x = ref(1); return { x }; } 
// data() { return { x: 2 } }
explanation: Variables returned from setup collide with data(). Setup wins. Console warning usually.

title: v-bind Coercion
explanation: `null` or `undefined` removes the attribute.

title: Global mixin application
explanation:
Correct in Vue 3. 
Error: `Vue.mixin({})` affects ALL apps created with `createApp`? No, `Vue.mixin` is Vue 2 global. in Vue 3 use `app.mixin`. But generally discouraged.

title: Slot Forwarding
explanation: Dynamic slot names allow forwarding.

title: Missing style tag lang
explanation:
If no preprocessor loader is configured, this fails. (Assuming standard setup, this is correct). 
Real error: `<style>$var: red;</style>` -> CSS doesn't support SCSS syntax without `lang="scss"`.

title: CSS Module identifier
explanation: Property access for classes with dashes.

title: Ref vs Reactive reassignment
codeSnippet: let state = reactive({ count: 0 }); state = { count: 1 };
explanation: Reassigning the variable `state` breaks the reference to the reactive proxy. The new object is not reactive.

title: Class merging
codeSnippet: Static class and bound :class are merged.
explanation: Both result in final class list.

title: Computed function caching
explanation: If `fullName` is a method, must call it `fullName()`. If it's used as property `fullName`, it creates a function string reference, or expects a computed property.

title: V-model argument null
explanation: If arg is null, binding is removed (careful if v-model requires it).

title: Inject default value
explanation:
Correct syntax. 
Error: `inject: ['key', { default: 'val' }]` - array syntax doesn't support defaults directly.

title: UseSlots reactivity
explanation: `useSlots()` (and `useAttrs()`) return a non-reactive object in terms of watching the object itself changing reference, but its properties are updated. Watching it directly might not trigger. Use `onUpdated` lifecycle for slot content changes.

title: v-model arg expression
explanation: Dynamic argument expressions have syntax constraints (no spaces/operators usually, unless simple). Complex expressions should be computed.

title: Transition root comment
explanation: If child is hidden, it renders a comment. `<transition>` transitioning a comment node does nothing or might warn. It expects an element/component entering/leaving.

title: Setup return type
explanation: Yes, but requires `<Suspense>` in parent.

title: ShallowReactive nested mutation
codeSnippet: const state = shallowReactive({ deep: { count: 0 } }); state.deep.count++;
explanation: It updates the value, but UI won't re-render because `shallowReactive` only tracks root-level properties. Nested objects are not converted to proxies.

title: V-model custom modifiers
explanation: Passed via `modelModifiers` prop.

title: Props validation type
explanation: Type should be the constructor `String`, not string literal `'String'`.

title: CSS Bindings
codeSnippet: v-bind in CSS works in scoped styles.
explanation: `color: v-bind(colorVar)` links CSS to JS state.

title: V-show template
explanation: `v-show` acts on the element's style property `display`. `<template>` tag renders nothing in DOM itself, so `v-show` has no effect (or warns). Use `v-if` or wrapper `div`.

title: Emits Validator
explanation: Declares event without validation.

title: Slot shorthand with dynamic
explanation:
Valid syntax for dynamic slot name shorthand. 
Error: `#[dynamicName]="props"` vs `v-slot:[dynamicName]="props"`? Both valid. Real error: `#:dynamicName` (invalid syntax).

title: Provide Injection default
explanation: Using second arg as default value.

title: Missing defineExpose
explanation: `<script setup>` is closed by default. Parent accessing template ref cannot see variables unless `defineExpose({ x })` is called.

title: Setup Props Reactivity
explanation: The `props` object is a reactive proxy.

title: WatchEffect clean-up placement
explanation:
Valid. 
Error: `watchEffect(() => { return () => clean() })` - watchEffect doesn't use return for cleanup like React `useEffect`. Must use `onInvalidate` arg.

title: Component Is vs :Is
explanation: If `C` is a registered component name string. Often `:is` is used for dynamic variable.

title: Duplicate v-for variable
explanation: Shadowing the loop variable `item`. Confusing but valid JS scoping. Avoid for clarity.

title: v-bind .prop modifier
explanation: Binds as DOM property instead of attribute.

title: Computed setter missing param
explanation: Setter receives the new value. `set(val) { ... }`.

title: Teleport multiple targets
explanation: Uses `querySelector`. If multiple match, uses first one.

title: Router name route invalid param
explanation:
Valid. 
Error: providing `params` for a path-based navigation (e.g. `path: '/user'`) -> params are ignored/warned. With `name`, params work.

title: KeepAlive include
explanation: Only caches components with matching name.

title: V-model checkbox array
explanation:
Valid if `arr` is an array. It adds/removes '1'. 
Error: if `arr` is boolean, `value` is ignored. If `arr` is array, `value` is required.

title: Directive hook created
codeSnippet: created hook exists for directives in Vue 3.
explanation: Called before attributes/listeners applied.

title: Transition appear prop
explanation:
Valid used to animate on initial render. 
Error: `appear` logic without `appear-active-class` (uses enter class by default).

title: Ref vs DOM Ref
codeSnippet: Template refs are unified with reactive refs.
explanation: Assign the reactive ref to `ref` attribute.

title: Global property readonly
explanation: Global properties are meant to be constant/singleton tools. Modifying them at runtime is generally bad practice and not reactive.

title: Router view name
explanation: Named views allow rendering multiple components for one route.

title: Async Component Error wrapper
explanation:
Valid. 
Error: `defineAsyncComponent(() => import(...))` - no error component. If loading fails, just nothing/error console. Object syntax needed for error handling.

title: Setup Context Slots
explanation: Returns array of VNodes.

title: Watch Flush timing
explanation:
Valid. 
Error: `flush: 'pre'` (default) accesses DOM before update. If you need updated DOM, use 'post'. Incorrect flush usage causes bugs ref accessing old DOM.

title: Transition Javascript hooks
explanation: Disabling CSS detection for JS-only transitions prevents delays.

title: V-model number modifier text
explanation: If input value cannot be parsed with `parseFloat()`, it returns original string. It doesn't force NaN or throwing. Valid code.

title: Custom Directive getSSRProps
codeSnippet: Function to handle directives during SSR.
explanation: Since logic usually relies on DOM, SSR needs specific prop rendering.

title: DefineProps generic argument
explanation:
Valid TS syntax. 
Error: `defineProps(['msg'])` doesn't provide type inference.

title: MarkRaw
explanation: Prevents object from being converted to proxy.

title: Ref vs ToRef
explanation: This copies the current value of `props.title`. If parent updates title, `propRef` does NOT update. Use `toRef(props, 'title')` to maintain connection.

title: ShallowReadonly
codeSnippet: Only root level properties are readonly.
explanation: Nested objects remain mutable/reactive (if they were).

title: Event modifier chaining order
explanation: Order matters. `prevent.self` prevents all clicks, then checks self? No. `prevent` happens, then `self` check. `self.prevent` checks `self` first, then prevents. `click.prevent.self` prevents default action on element AND children, but handler only fires on self? No, modifiers are processed in order.

title: Dynamic Component KeepAlive Exclude
explanation: Comma-separated string or RegExp or Array.

title: Duplicate attribute v-bind
explanation: If both static and bound attribute exist, bound wins (or they override based on order in older Vue). In Vue 3, individual attributes usually override v-bind object. But direct collision? `b` overrides `a`.

title: Suspense events
explanation: Events emitted by Suspense component.

title: Setup context emit
explanation:
Valid. 
Error: `setup(props) { this.$emit('e') }`. `this` is not available.

title: Transition Persist
codeSnippet: Transition keeps element in DOM while leaving.
explanation: Until animation finishes.

title: Computed setter return
explanation: Setter return value is ignored. It should mutate state.

title: NextTick Promise
explanation: Awaitable: `await nextTick()`.

title: V-model modifier unknown
explanation: Native `v-model` doesn't support `.uppercase`. Only `.number`, `.trim`, `.lazy`. Custom components can handle custom modifiers.

title: Setup async usage
explanation: Requires Suspense in component tree.

title: V-once on v-for
explanation: Renders list once. If source changes, list does NOT update. Valid but often bug if updates expected.

title: Directive created hook
explanation: New in Vue 3.

title: UseCSSModule in setup
explanation:
Valid. 
Error: `useCssModule` requires `<style module="my-module">` to exist.

title: DefineModel
explanation: Official macro in 3.4+.

title: Slot props destructured default
explanation:
Valid syntax. 
Error: `v-slot="{ user: 'Guest' }"` (invalid destructuring syntax for default).

title: KeepAlive Lifecycle
explanation: Called when component inside KeepAlive is toggled.

title: V-model number input type
explanation: It automatically converts to number IF `type="number"`. However, `v-model.number` is safer for cases where type is dynamic or text.

title: Inject Optional
explanation: Returns null if not provided.

title: Custom directive unmounted
explanation:
Valid in Vue 3. 
Error: `unbind` (Vue 2 name).

title: Async Component Hydration
explanation: Depending on strategy (hydrate on idle, visible, etc in Nuxt contexts). Standard Vue hydrates on load.

title: V-for range zero index
explanation: `n` starts at 1, not 0. So it renders 1, 2, 3, 4, 5.

title: Watch deep array mutation
codeSnippet: Watch on array triggers on push?
explanation: If watching array ref, yes (in Vue 3 with deep/proxy).

title: Script Setup imports
codeSnippet:
<script setup> import { val } from './utils'; </script>
// template: {{ val }}
explanation: Valid. Imports are automatically exposed to template.

title: Reactive Class
explanation: Converts class instance to proxy.

title: Props mutating default array
explanation: Repeated error: Must use factory function `() => []`.

title: Provide Reactive
explanation: Downstream injections will track changes.

title: Setup emits usage
explanation:
Valid. 
Error: `setup(props) { props.emit('x') }` - props object doesn't have emit.

title: Effect Flush
explanation: Forces effect to run synchronously.

title: V-bind object order
explanation: In Vue 3, order matters for overrides. `id="b"` overrides `id: 'a'` because it comes after. In Vue 2, separate prop always won.

title: Router meta fields
explanation: Custom data attached to routes.

title: Watch cleanup invalid
explanation:
Valid. 
Error: `onCleanup` being called after async await. Cleanup registration must be synchronous.

title: Suspense timeout
explanation: Allows showing previous content for a while before fallback.

title: Computed getter arguments
explanation: Computed properties (getters) do NOT accept arguments. Use a method instead.

title: Ref vs Reactive destructure
explanation: `const { x } = refObj.value` works if value is object, but x is not reactive connection.

title: Inject key symbol vs string
codeSnippet: const key = Symbol(); provide(key, val); inject('key')
explanation: Injection fails because `Symbol()` key is not equal to string `'key'`. Must inject with the same Symbol reference.

title: Style v-bind runtime
codeSnippet: Updates CSS variable when JS value changes.
explanation: Vue updates the inline style variable.

title: Template root logical
explanation: Valid usage of v-if/else on template tags (creates invisible wrapper).

title: Router View Transition
explanation: Proper way to wrap router component in transition in Vue 3 (inside router-view slot).

title: V-model modifier without prop
explanation: Valid ONLY if `Comp` accepts `modelModifiers` prop and handles capitalization. If not handled, modifier is ignored/passed through. Not strict error but functional failure.

title: DefineOptions
explanation: Allows defining Component options in script setup.

title: Duplicate directives
explanation: Duplicate attribute `v-if`. Invalid HTML/Vue template.

title: Ref Unwrapping Array
codeSnippet: Refs in reactive arrays are NOT unwrapped.
explanation: Accessing `arr[0]` returns the Ref object, need `.value`.

title: Watch immediate trigger
explanation:
Valid. Triggers immediately. 
Real Error: relying on `oldValue` being defined in immediate run. `oldValue` is undefined.

title: Directive created hook params
explanation: Standard signature.

title: Teleport to non-existent
explanation: Starts warning/error if target doesn't exist at mount time. Target must exist.

title: Reactive Collection Set
explanation: Set methods are intercepted.

title: V-bind prop modifier shorthand
explanation: Previously `.prop` modifier existed. In Vue 3, shorthand `:prop.prop`? No, use `.prop` modifier on v-bind? Actually `.prop` is `.` prefix in some syntaxes (like `.id="x"` in lit-html, but in Vue it's `.prop` modifier). Valid.

title: Key on Template v-for
codeSnippet: Key should be on <template> tag in Vue 3.
explanation: Start of fragment need key.

title: Setup return render function + template
explanation: If setup returns render function, the `<template>` block is ignored.

title: UseSlots vs $slots
explanation: Exposes slots in setup.

title: Async Setup top level
explanation: Valid top-level await in script setup. Makes component async (needs Suspense).

title: Custom Event validation
codeSnippet: Function in emits option returns boolean.
explanation: If false, warning is logged.

title: Ref unwrapping Map
codeSnippet:
const map = reactive(new Map([['a', ref(1)]])); 
// map.get('a') returns 1?
explanation: No, map values are NOT automatically unwrapped (unlike object properties). Returns the Ref.

title: Component V-model argument
explanation: In Vue 3.

title: Prop type Date
explanation: Valid. Checks `instanceof Date`.

title: V-memo dependency
explanation: Like useMemo/React.memo.

title: V-on dynamic event null
explanation: If dynamic argument is null, the listener is NOT bound. (Valid behavior, not error).

title: NextTick microtask
explanation: For efficiency.

title: Setup context props spread
explanation: Copying/Spreading props object loses reactivity. Returned object has static values.

title: Scoped Slot Props Name
codeSnippet: Can rename slot props in v-slot.
explanation: `v-slot="{ user: person }"` works (destructuring).

title: DefineExpose not in script setup
explanation:
Valid usage. 
Error: `setup() { defineExpose({}) }`. `defineExpose` is script setup macro, for normal setup use context `expose`.

title: V-model checkbox true-value
explanation: Valid. Allows binding numbers instead of boolean.

title: UseAttrs reactivity
explanation: It updates when parent attributes update (but object ID might stay same? No, in Vue 3 it's a proxy or updates props). Usually safer to rely on `onUpdated` for side effects.

title: Watch key path
explanation:
Valid getter function usage. 
Error: `watch('obj.a.b', ...)` works in Options API string path, but not with Composition API `watch` (needs getter).

title: V-once dynamic content
explanation: Static interpolation.

title: Inject default factory
explanation: Valid. 3rd arg `true` means treat 2nd arg as factory function.

title: Props CamelCase
codeSnippet: kebab-case in HTML maps to camelCase in JS props.
explanation: Standard Vue normalization.

title: Custom Ref factory
codeSnippet: customRef((track, trigger) => ({ get() { track(); return val }, set(v) { val = v; trigger() } }))
explanation: Valid pattern for debounced/custom refs.

title: ToRaw proxy
explanation: Escape hatch for reading without tracking overhead.

title: V-is deprecated
explanation: `v-is` was deprecated in favor of `is="vue:my-component"` attribute (DOM template parsing workaround).

title: Slot content access
codeSnippet: Parent can access slot content DOM.
explanation: Slot content is in child's shadow/DOM. Parent provides it, but once rendered, it belongs to child's layout tree structurally? Parent scope owns data, but child renders it.

title: Watch multiple sources
explanation: Valid.

title: KeepAlive max
codeSnippet: max prop limits number of cached instances.
explanation: LRU cache eviction.

title: Reactive destructure lose reactivity
explanation: `count` is a primitive number here, disjoint from the reactive object. Updates won't trigger UI.

title: Async Component default loading
explanation: `import()` returns promise.

title: V-bind class array object
explanation: Valid. Mixed array/object syntax.

title: Vue 3 Filter
explanation: Removed in Vue 3. Use methods or computed.

title: Setup props destructuring with toRefs
explanation: Valid. `title` is a Ref connected to props.

title: Effect Scope
codeSnippet: capture reactive effects mostly for library authors.
explanation: `effectScope()` allows bulk disposal.

title: Provide global
explanation: Valid. Application-level provide.

title: Teleport disabled
explanation: Renders content in-place if disabled.

title: Ref unwrap in shallowReactive
codeSnippet:
const state = shallowReactive({ count: ref(0) }); 
// state.count + 1
explanation: Shallow reactive does NOT auto-unwrap refs. Must use `state.count.value`.

title: Transition hooks done
explanation: If `done` argument exists, Vue waits for it. Otherwise synchronous.

title: Functional component syntax
explanation: Valid functional component in Vue 3 (plain function).

title: NextTick await
explanation: Returns promise.

title: V-model multiple bindings
explanation: Valid in Vue 3.

title: DefineEmits array
explanation: Simple declaration.

title: Readonly ref mutation
explanation: Readonly proxy prevents mutation. Warns in console.

title: V-for object iteration
explanation: Iterates properties.

title: Component name casing self-reference
explanation: Valid. Components can recursively refer to themselves by name.

title: Watch source function
codeSnippet: Watch source can be getter function.
explanation: `() => state.count`.

title: Style scoped deep selector deprecated
explanation: `>>>` is deprecated. Use `:deep(.child)` combinator.

title: Transition Group Tag
explanation: Vue 3: Does not render a wrapper element by default (fragment) unless `tag` prop provided. (Vue 2 was span).

title: V-bind null
explanation: Valid. Attribute is removed.

title: Ref value access
explanation: Refs are auto-unwrapped in top-level template context.

title: Computed setter side effect
codeSnippet: computed: { get() { localStorage.setItem('x', this.v); return this.v; } }
explanation: Computed getters should be side-effect free. Use watchers for side effects.

title: CSS Bindings reactivity
explanation: Uses CSS variables updated by component.

title: V-model file input
explanation: File inputs are read-only. `v-model` not supported. Use `@change`.

title: Provide Inject hierarchy
explanation: Walks up the tree.

title: DefineProps runtime declaration
explanation: Valid runtime declaration.

title: V-for priority
codeSnippet: v-for has higher priority than v-if.
explanation: In Vue 3, `v-if` has HIGHER priority than `v-for`. (In Vue 2 it was reverse).

title: Vue 3 fragment key
explanation: Valid. `key` on `<template v-for>` works.

title: Watch vs WatchEffect
explanation: No need to declare sources.

title: Emits option missing
codeSnippet: // component emits 'update' but not declared in emits option.
explanation: In Vue 3, it's strongly recommended to declare emits. If not, and it matches a native event (like click), it might trigger twice (native + vue event) or fall through to attribute listeners? No, if undefined, it falls through to `$attrs` listeners. If standard event, it's fine. If custom, fine. But best practice warning.

title: Setup props type
explanation: Should not mutate props.

title: Array splice reactivity
explanation: Valid. Triggers update.

title: Reactive Map
explanation: Supported in Vue 3.

title: Unknown slot prop
explanation: Destructuring `id` which is not provided (only `title` is). `id` will be undefined. Logic error.

title: Suspense experimental
explanation: Still considered experimental API.

title: Setup internal usage
explanation: Valid, but internal API. usage discouraged for application code, useful for libraries.

title: V-bind order sensitivity
explanation: Later attributes override earlier ones.

title: Computed setter missing arguments
explanation: Setter needs to accept a value: `set(newValue)`. Without it, you can't allow assignment.

title: UseSlots and optional chaining
explanation: Safe invocation.

title: Model modifiers prop type
explanation: Model modifiers prop should default to an empty Object, not Array. It receives `{ modifierName: true }`.

title: Component emits validator context
codeSnippet: Validator receives args passed to emit.
explanation: To validate payload.

title: Setup return render function no h
codeSnippet: import { h } from 'vue'; setup() { return () => h('div'); }
explanation:
Agreed logic. Valid. 
Error: `setup() { return h('div') }` - Setup must return either state object OR a function (render function). Returning VNode directly runs only once at setup, not reactor.

title: V-model argument dynamic
explanation: Dynamic argument supported.

title: Watch source reactive property
codeSnippet: const state = reactive({ count: 0 }); watch(state.count, cb)
explanation: `state.count` returns a number (0). `watch` expects a ref, reactive object, or function. It can't watch a primitive value directly. Needs `() => state.count`.

title: ToRef vs Ref
codeSnippet: toRef creates a ref that syncs with source property.
explanation: Unlike `ref(obj.prop)` which makes a copy.

title: V-bind style object array
explanation: Valid. Merges style objects.

title: Provide Injection reactivity
codeSnippet: Injected properties are read-only by default.
explanation: They are whatever object was passed. If a reactive object was provided, it remains reactive and mutable (unless `readonly` wrapper used).

title: Router Push syntax
explanation: `params` are ignored when `path` is provided. Use `name` or embed param in path.

title: Transition events order
explanation: Standard flow.

title: Directly modifying prop object
codeSnippet: props: { config: Object }, mounted() { this.config.active = true; }
explanation: Mutating object passed as prop mimics 2-way binding but is anti-pattern (affects parent state obscurely). Should emit event.

title: Slots key
codeSnippet: In render functions, slots are objects.
explanation: Functions returning VNodes.

title: V-if v-show combined
explanation: Generally discouraged but valid. `v-if` has priority (element won't exist). If exists, `v-show` toggles display.

title: App Mount Return
codeSnippet: createApp(...).mount() returns the root component instance.
explanation: The proxy instance.

title: Ref unwrap in array push
explanation: No unwrapping in reactive arrays. `arr[1]` is the Ref object.

title: Watch Option Deep Default
explanation: Watching a reactive object directly forces deep traversal.

title: V-model argument conflict
explanation: Duplicate attribute binding for `foo`. Invalid.

title: Setup Macro Imports
explanation: Compiler macros are available globally in script setup.

title: Root node attributes inheritance
explanation: If caller passes attributes (class/events), Vue doesn't know where to apply them (Fallthrough attributes). Must bind `$attrs` explicitly key or disable inheritance warning.

title: Router Link active class
explanation: Can be configured.

title: Global mixin application
explanation: Valid. Applies to all components within that app instance.

title: KeepAlive max instances
explanation: LRU strategy.

title: Custom directive lifecycle hook renaming
explanation: `bind` renamed to `beforeMount` in Vue 3 (to match component lifecycle).

title: Ref vs Reactive types
codeSnippet: Ref handles primitives, Reactive handles objects.
explanation: General rule, though Ref can handle objects (wraps in reactive).

title: WatchEffect async await placement
explanation: Dependencies accessed AFTER await are NOT tracked. `dep.value` won't trigger re-run.

title: Teleport multiple sources
codeSnippet: Multiple teleports to same target append content.
explanation: They stack.

title: Computed write-only
explanation: Computed properties MUST have a getter. Write-only computed is not supported.

title: V-memo empty array
explanation: Never updates.

title: Key duplicate literal
explanation: Static key '1' repeated for loop items. Duplicate key error.

title: Unref utility
codeSnippet: unref(val) is sugar for val = isRef(val) ? val.value : val.
explanation: Returns inner value.

title: Setup expose internal
explanation: Valid usage to restrict public API.

title: Reactive array length
explanation: Works in Vue 3 (Proxy).

title: Component name string
explanation: First argument must be a string name. `app.component('MyComp', {})`.

title: Slots default fallback
explanation: Renders if no content provided.

title: Props type mismatch warning
explanation: Passed as string "1". Validation fails/warns. Need `:n="1"`.

title: V-model custom event name
explanation: In Vue 3.

title: Watch deep true fallback
explanation: Watching a getter that returns an object does NOT default to deep. Only fires if object reference changes. Need `{ deep: true }`.

title: Async Component Suspense
explanation: If used inside Suspense.

title: Unknown directive
explanation: Vue compiler warns/fails on resolve.

title: Setup lifecycle beforeCreate
explanation: Replaces them.

title: V-on modifier keycode deprecated
explanation: KeyCodes are deprecated in Vue 3. Use `@keyup.enter`.

title: Global Properties vs Provide
codeSnippet: Provide/Inject is preferred over global properties.
explanation: Cleaner dependency injection.

title: Destructure props reactivity test
explanation: Reactivity lost on destructured primitive prop. WatchEffect won't re-run.

title: Readonly deep
explanation: Recursive check.

title: Style v-bind undefined
explanation: If variable is undefined, CSS variable value is invalid/unset. Not fatal error, but no style.

title: V-if template root
explanation: Wraps multiple elements conditionally.

title: Reactive primitive
explanation: `reactive()` only works with objects. Use `ref()` for primitives. (Vue warns value cannot be made reactive).

title: DefineProps destructure strict
explanation: Destructuring props loses reactivity in Vue 3 < 3.3. In 3.3+ with Reactivity Transform (deprecated) or `defineProps` destructure feature (stable in 3.4/3.5), it works. Assuming standard Vue 3 context, this often flags as a reactivity loss issue.

title: V-bind same name shorthand
explanation: New feature in 3.4.

title: Emit native event name
explanation: Valid. Overrides native click listener on root. Recommended to document/control custom clicks.

title: App Use return
explanation: Allows chaining.

title: Watch reactive property direct source
explanation: Repeated concept: `state.count` (number) is not a valid watch source. Needs `() => state.count`.

title: V-is for components
codeSnippet: Used for dynamic components in Vue 3.
explanation: `v-is` is deprecated/removed? Use `<component :is="...">` or `is="vue:..."`.

title: Setup Context attrs not reactive
explanation: `attrs` is not reactive in the sense of being a Ref. It is a proxy that stays up to date? Actually `attrs` is a non-reactive object. Watching it doesn't work reliably. Use `onUpdated`.

title: Props default accesses this
explanation: Props validation runs before instance creation. `this` is not available.

title: Prop mutation through method
explanation: Mutating array prop. Valid JS, triggers update in parent (if same object), but Vue warns against mutating props. Bad practice.

title: UseSlots reactivity check
explanation: It returns a plain object (updated on render), not a reactive one you can watch.

title: DefineAsyncComponent missing loader
explanation: `loader` option is mandatory.

title: Directive binding value
explanation: E.g. `v-my="1+1"` -> value is 2.

title: Inject from sibling
codeSnippet: // Sibling A provides 'key'. Sibling B injects 'key'.
explanation: Provide/Inject works hierarchically (Ancestor -> Descendant). Siblings cannot inject from each other.

title: Reactive vs ShallowReactive
explanation: Performance optimization.

title: Ref value type
explanation: `ref(map)` wraps the map in a Ref. `r` is the Ref `{ value: map }`. Need `r.value.set(...)`.

title: Router hash mode
explanation: Hash mode works without server config (unlike History mode).

title: Prop default array reference
explanation: Classic error. Default for array/object must be a factory function.

title: Computed cache
explanation: Only re-evaluates when dependencies change.

title: V-for key index usage
explanation: Using index as key is discouraged if list can be reordered/filtered. Can cause rendering bugs.

title: Watch source array deep
codeSnippet: Watching getter `() => arr` is NOT deep by default.
explanation: Need `{ deep: true }` or watch the reactive array directly.

title: Multiple script blocks
explanation: Valid. Commonly used to declare `name` or `inheritAttrs` alongside script setup.

title: NextTick context
explanation: In Options API.

title: V-model modifier argument
explanation: Valid syntax. Modifiers passed as `titleModifiers` prop.

title: Component name hook
explanation: Self-reference in template.

title: Provide inside loop
explanation: `provide` is a component-setup level API (or app level). Cannot use inside template rendering loop directly. Must be in `setup()` or `provide` option. (Unless component inside loop calls provide).

title: Slot shorthand
explanation: Standard shorthand.

title: Async Setup without Suspense
codeSnippet: <script setup> await x </script> // Parent has no Suspense
explanation: Component will fail to mount/render properly (or nothing shows) if Suspsense is missing in ancestry. Warns in console.

title: Global Directives
explanation: Available in all components.

title: Computed setter only
explanation: Computed must have a `get` function.

title: Vue 3 IE11 Support
explanation: Dropped in Vue 3 (uses Proxies).

title: V-bind object null
explanation: Valid. Does nothing.

title: Watch sync
explanation: Actually 'pre' fires before DOM update. 'sync' fires synchronously during mutation? Yes. 'pre' is default (buffered before DOM). 'sync' is forced sync.

title: Dynamic slot name shorthand invalid
explanation: Valid usage `#['header']`.

title: Transition CSS classes
explanation: Standard class naming.

title: V-model multiple on same prop
explanation: Duplicate model binding for 'a'. Invalid.

title: KeepAlive nested
explanation: Cache sub-trees.

title: Emit args mismatch
explanation: Valid. Extra args passed to listener.

title: V-once reactivity
explanation: Renders once, then static.

title: Prop type constructor string
explanation: Repeated error: Use `String` constructor, not string literal.

title: App Unmount
explanation: Cleans up directives/events.

title: V-show on template
explanation: Repeated error: `v-show` needs a DOM element style attribute. `<template>` doesn't exist in DOM.

title: Ref value object
explanation: Wraps value in reactive().

title: Computed side effect in get
explanation: Side effect (mutation) in computed getter. Can cause infinite loops or unpredictable behavior.

title: Vue 3 Multi-root
explanation: No single root requirement.

title: Router link to missing
explanation: Effectively renders but clicking does nothing or matches 404 route if defined. Not a compile error.

title: WatchEffect flush post
explanation: Correct.

title: Setup return array
explanation: Setup must return Object (bindings) or Function (render). Array return is invalid.

title: Options API support
explanation: Fully supported first-class citizen.

title: Duplicate slot content
explanation: Duplicate slot 'header'. One will overwrite the other.

title: Teleport multiple targets
codeSnippet: Can teleport to multiple different targets simultaneously.
explanation: Single `to` target.

title: UseRouter in template
explanation: `useRouter()` (and other composables) should only be called in `setup()`. In template, they might return undefined or create new instances unnecessarily. Use `$router` or expose a method from setup.

title: Teleport dynamic to
explanation: Can move content around.

title: Setup context slots call
explanation: Valid. Render function invoking default slot.

title: Reactivity Transform
explanation: Experimental/Deprecated in recent versions, but concept is true.

title: V-model modifier prop type
explanation: Valid prop definition for modifiers.

title: Custom Directive Arguments
explanation: binding.arg.

title: Global provide override
explanation: Valid. Component override shadows global provide for its descendants.

title: Transition mode
codeSnippet: mode="out-in" waits for leave before enter.
explanation: Prevents layout jump.

title: Async Component hydrate
explanation: No standard `hydrate` option in `defineAsyncComponent`. (Nuxt might have dedicated helpers, but base Vue does not).

title: V-bind style array
explanation: Merges styles.

title: Setup async without await
explanation: Valid. Component becomes async even if no await used? Yes, returns promise. Needs Suspense.

title: WatchEffect stop
explanation: Calling it stops the watcher.

title: Ref unwrap in Map set
codeSnippet: const m = reactive(new Map()); m.set('x', ref(1)); console.log(m.get('x') + 1)
explanation: `m.get('x')` returns the Ref object (not unwrapped in Map). Result is `[object Object]1` string or NaN. Need `m.get('x').value`.

title: KeepAlive include regex
explanation: Regex supported.

title: V-model checkbox true-value type
explanation:
Valid static string. 
Error: `true-value={}` (object literal in attr must be bound with v-bind).

title: Setup props destructure default
explanation: Reactivity transform or newer props destructuring features.

title: Inject default from other inject
codeSnippet: const a = inject('a'); const b = inject('b', a);
explanation: Valid. Default value can be dynamic.

title: V-for destructuring
explanation: Supported.

title: Key duplicate null
explanation: Duplicate keys (all null). Causing render issues. Key must be unique primitive.

title: Watch source array ref
explanation: Watching the Ref of an array only triggers if the .value (array reference) changes. Does not Deep watch contents unless `{ deep: true }` (unlike `reactive` array).

title: Computed setter mutation
explanation:
Valid usage (updating other state). 
Error: `computed: { set(v) { return v } }` (missing get, pointless set).

title: App Version
explanation: Contains Vue version.

title: Ref vs Reactive reassignment
codeSnippet: let state = reactive({ count: 0 }); state = reactive({ count: 1 });
explanation: Reassigning the `state` variable breaks reactivity connection to the template (which used the old object). Reactivity relies on constant reference.

title: Teleport to body
explanation: Avoids stacking contexts.

title: V-model arg null
explanation: If arg is null, binding is removed/ignored. `v-model` requires binding. (Actually `v-bind:[null]` removes attribute, but `v-model` needs to bind to something. Usually valid-ish but non-functional).

title: Custom Directive Hook arguments
explanation: Standard args.

title: Script setup export default
explanation: `<script setup>` cannot contain `export default`. Use a separate `<script>` block for options/exports.

title: Router View slot
explanation: Key for transitions.

title: Watch cleanup async
explanation: Valid. Cleanup function can be async (but Vue doesn't await it effectively before next run? It just calls it).

title: IsRef check
explanation: It's a Proxy (reactive), not a Ref.

title: Emits object syntax validation
explanation: Valid. Validator returns true/truthy if valid.

title: Scoped CSS deep
explanation: Penetrates scope.

title: Effect scope run
explanation: Valid usage.

title: Transition appear default
codeSnippet: appear uses enter classes by default.
explanation: Unless appear-class specified.

title: V-for object ref update
codeSnippet:
const obj = ref({ a: 1 }); // v-for in obj. 
// obj.value.b = 2;
explanation: Valid. Adding property to ref Object triggers reactive update in Vue 3 (Proxy).

title: Component name deduction
codeSnippet: Inferred from file name if not specified.
explanation: When importing.

title: Provide ref unwrapping
explanation: Provided values are NOT automatically wrapped/unwrapped. If you provide a ref, you inject a ref.

title: V-pre usage
explanation: Displays raw mustache tags.

title: Ref circular dependency
explanation: Valid JS, but logging it might crash console. Vue reactivity handles it fine (proxy).

title: Setup return promise
codeSnippet: Can return promise implicitly via await.
explanation: Makes component async.

title: Duplicate v-else
explanation: `v-else` must follow `v-if` or `v-else-if`. Double `v-else` is invalid.

title: Slot name dynamic
explanation: Supported.

title: WatchEffect options deep
explanation: `watchEffect` doesn't have `deep` option. It tracks whatever is accessed during query. If you access nested props, it tracks them.

title: Router beforeEnter
explanation: Defined in routes config.

title: Setup props property write
explanation: Props are readonly. Warns.

title: KeepAlive render
explanation: Abstract component.

title: Template key conflict
explanation:
Valid usage (e.g. inside `v-for` or `v-if`). 
Error: `v-for` on `<template>` requires key on `<template>`, not children. Correct.

title: V-on object syntax
explanation: Binds multiple events.

title: Ref unwrap in reactive map key
explanation: Using a Ref object as a key in Map is valid, but weird. It's stored by reference. No unwrapping happens for keys or values in Map.

title: V-model argument dynamic null
explanation: Valid. Dynamic argument resolving to null removes the binding.

title: DefineComponent validation
explanation: It's a no-op for type inference.

title: Setup return render function with slots
explanation: Valid. Rendering default slot.

title: App component unmount
explanation: Removes from DOM.

title: Provide inject default function
explanation: Valid. Third argument `true` treats default as factory function.

title: Watch source function
explanation: Getter function support.

title: Props mutation object property
explanation: Mutating a nested property of a prop object affects the source object (if it's passed by reference). Vue 3 might not prevent this (shallow readonly proxy on props?), but it's bad practice (one-way flow).

title: V-bind class array object
explanation: Mixed syntax supported.

title: Directives hook naming
explanation: `destroyed` is not a directive hook in Vue 3. It's `unmounted`. (Same for `beforeDestroy` -> `beforeUnmount`).

title: Computed vs Method
explanation: Methods re-run every render.

title: Watch multiple sources array
explanation: Valid. Watch accepts array of sources.

title: Slot props scope
codeSnippet: Slot props are available in parent scope.
explanation: Only available inside the slot content template tags.

title: Setup emit validator
explanation: Valid. Null means no validation.

title: App config globalProperties
explanation: app.config.globalProperties.

title: Ref unwrap in array
explanation:
Array elements are NOT automatically unwrapped (unlike object properties) when accessed. Need `arr[0].value`. 
Wait, actually: Ref unwrapping in Reactive Objects -> yes. In Reactive Arrays? NO. Vue 3 design choice. 
Correction: `reactive([ref(0)])` - accessing index DOES NOT unwrap.

title: NextTick promise
explanation: Can be awaited.

title: DefineProps runtime declaration
explanation: Valid syntax (Runtime declaration).

title: TransitionGroup tag
explanation:
Unlike Vue 2 (required span/div). But wait, does it? No, TransitionGroup renders a wrapper element by default? 
Actually: Vue 3 `TransitionGroup` does NOT render a wrapper by default (it's a fragment) ONLY IF you don't specify `tag`. 
Wait, docs say: "By default, it doesn't render a wrapper element." Correct.

title: Component is attribute
explanation: Valid.

title: Teleport disabled
explanation: Renders at original location.

title: V-bind same name shorthand
explanation: Valid in Vue 3.4+. Invalid in older versions.

title: Reactive collection reassignment
explanation: Must use ref if you need to replace the reference.

title: Suspense nested
explanation: Valid. Nested suspense coordinates loading states.

title: Keys in template v-for
explanation: Key should be on the template tag.

title: Setup context emit case
explanation: Valid. Emits kebab-case.

title: V-memo dependency
explanation: Equivalent to v-once.

title: Custom Ref missing get/set
explanation: Valid structure.

title: Composition API this
explanation: Core design.

title: Watch deep default for reactive
explanation: When watching a reactive object directly, it is implicitly deep.

title: Options API mixins
explanation: Composables are preferred.

title: Prop validation fails return false
explanation: Console warning.

title: V-bind object order
explanation: Later attributes overwrite earlier ones.

title: Inject missing default
explanation: Returns undefined if not found. Warns if no default provided? Actually, it just returns undefined and warns in dev.

title: Ref vs Reactive destructuring
explanation: Use toRefs.

title: V-once dynamic
explanation: Valid. ID will be rendered once and never update even if `id` ref changes.

title: Script setup top level await
explanation: Makes it async.

title: Template root comment
explanation: Valid. Comment is a node.

title: Style scoped performance
codeSnippet: Scoped styles are slower than CSS Modules.
explanation: Performance diff is negligible. Implementation details vary.

title: DefineExpose argument
explanation: Valid. Exposes bindings to template refs.

title: V-if vs V-show initial render
codeSnippet: V-if has higher initial render cost.
explanation: V-if is lazy (lower initial cost if false). V-show always renders (higher cost if false).

title: Router link event
explanation: `router-link` catches click event to navigate. To listen to it, you might need `@click.native` (Vue 2) or standard `@click` (Vue 3, bubbling?). Actually Vue 3 router-link renders an `a` tag. `@click` works but might conflict if not careful. `v-slot` API is preferred for custom logic.

title: Watch immediate
explanation: On creation.

title: Readonly ref mutation
explanation: Readonly prevents mutation. Warns/fails.

title: Setup props reactive
explanation: Yes.

title: V-bind duplicate keys
explanation: Valid in Vue. Classes are merged. (Wait, `class` and `:class` merge. Two `:class` attributes? HTML specification forbids duplicate attributes). Vue template compiler might handle it, but it's invalid HTML.

title: App component props
explanation: Passes root props.

title: Slot fallback content
explanation: Valid.

title: Provide Inject reactivity
codeSnippet: Injected values are readonly by default.
explanation: They retain the reactivity of the provided value (ref/reactive).

title: Dynamic Argument space
explanation: Spaces in attribute name/dynamic arg expression are often invalid in HTML syntax (attributes cannot contain spaces in names).

title: Setup return render func props
explanation: Setup render function does not receive props as argument. It closes over `props` from setup scope.

title: SSR serverPrefetch
explanation: Waits for promises.

title: DefineModel default
explanation: Valid in Vue 3.4+. Defines default value for model prop.

title: Reactive Map size
codeSnippet: Reactive Map matches native Map API.
explanation: Includes .size and methods.

title: Computed writeable missing set
explanation: Computed is readonly by default. Assignment warns/fails.

title: Vue 3 Fragments keys
explanation: Only if in v-for.
